com.ibm.xasdi_bridge.simulator

Class CitizenProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.xasdi_bridge.simulator.CitizenProxy

  • public abstract class CitizenProxy
extends java.lang.Object
    Part of Citizen agent. It mainly sends and receives messages.
